Our Foundations

Maud and Ivy, what does it mean and who are we?

Maud is a nickname I have had since childhood and Ivy is my daughter’s name and also a beautiful plant I like to work with. The name just seemed like a beautiful choice to me.

My son Nate also holds a special role with Maud and Ivy Flowers as he is in charge of quality control. Just like me, he has a great eye for detail and he oversees all my work. Together we are powerful, dependable and devoted to providing great service and work.

When you look deeper into the meanings of these names, they become more apt. Maud is an old name signifying a “powerful battler”. Historically Ivy wreaths were presented to couples as a sign of “fidelity and faithfulness”.

My real name is Monique and I was born on the Gold Coast in 1971 and have enjoyed living here my entire life. My father who migrated from Holland was a creative man and one of the Gold Coast's leading sign writers and sign makers in the 1970s-1990s [check dates]. He loved to entertain people with his humorous sketches.

Until now, nobody has followed in his creative footsteps. I recently decided to change direction in life due to injury and believe it has been a blessing in that I have now found my vocation. Creating gives me great pleasure. Handing over beautiful work for any occasion is very satisfying. Contemplating how I can make each and every arrangement more personal is essential to my process. I pride myself on taking thoughtful to the next level.

Our new logo “Leo” the lion was my creation. Leo encompasses who I am and where I want my work to go. The image as a whole embraces our beginnings, my beautiful Ivy and our strength, passion and charisma. My business is in its infancy with planning and development a constant work in progress. My ambitious nature doesn't allow me to settle on any one thing. I constantly want to improve every element that I present to the world.

bold unmistakable courageous

What We Do

Retail, Wedding and Event Florist, Gold Coast.

Do you have a special someone you want to surprise? Do you have an event you want to commemorate or celebrate? Are planning a wedding? Are you interstate, overseas or lack the time to drive around to retail shops? Do you want something that is special and unique? Are you driven by value not price? Do you appreciate details and like to plan ahead a little? If you can trust us to convey your wishes, then you're our customer!

We aim to provide personalised service resulting in stylish and extraordinary work for all occasions. We want you to feel good about your investment so we ask a few questions to make sure we understand your needs!

Give us a go! All the others who gave us a go, came back for more.

Monique, Nate & Ivy x

How to Order

To place your order request we will require all details as set out in our online ORDER REQUEST form. Please use the Online Order Request as often we are unable to respond to calls and texts immediately. We take time to curate and create beautiful florals and offerings and require as much notice as you can give.
